.
Reducing Section 306 Pension Cases for Hospitalization
When a Veteran in receipt of Section 306 Pension, having neither spouse nor child, has received two full months of VA treatment or care, reduce the award to $50 effective the first day of the third calendar month following admission, per
38 CFR 3.551(c)
.
Note
:  Per
38 CFR 3.551(f)
, consider treatment of
60 total days as two calendar months of hospitalization, and
90 total days as three calendar months of hospitalization.
